Suffolk Libraries

Help

Home → eLibrary

eLibrary

Download and stream eBooks, eAudio, MP3s and magazines for free. All you need is a library card. If you don't have one, apply for a card now →

Overdrive eBooks & eAudio

Borrow from a large range of eBooks and eAudio. Use the OverDrive website with your library card, or download apps for Android and iOS.

  • Set up Overdrive app
  • OverDrive website

3M Cloud Library eBooks

Borrow from hundreds of high quality eBooks. Use the 3M website with your library card, or download apps for Android and iOS.

  • Set up 3M Cloud Library app
  • 3M Cloud Library website

BorrowBox eAudio

Choose from a wide range of eAudio books. Use the OverDrive website with your library card, or download apps for Android and iOS.

  • Set up BorrowBox app
  • BorrowBox website

Zinio magazines

Download titles like Top Gear Magazine and Good Food to your device to keep forever.

  • Set up Zinio app
  • Zinio website

Freegal music

Download or stream from a choice of hundreds of thousands of songs, including the entire Sony back catalogue.

  • Set up Freegal app
  • Freegal website
